duties_responsibilities.duty: Educational approach in helping homeowners understand the benefits of solar energy.
Engage with potential clients to understand their needs and guide them through the solar installation process.
Utilize warm market lead generation system to generate referrals and sales.
Provide information and guidance in both English and Spanish to assist a diverse client base.
Earn while you learn in solar trainee program, providing live online training and certification to begin immediate sales.
Utilize unique soft sell approach to achieve high average total financial benefit for clients.
